text: He prayed to the Lord and told him, “Lord, wasn't this what I said when I was back home?4:2. Literally, “in my land.” That's why I ran away to Tarshish in the first place! For I knew that you are a gracious and compassionate God, very patient4:2. Or “slow to become angry.” and full of kindhearted love, who relents from sending disaster.
